title: Slow cooker chicken and sausage chilli
ingredients: ['3 (400g) tins whole plum tomatoes, chopped', '125ml beer', '1/4 teaspoon hot sauce', '2 beef stock cubes', '1 tablespoon dark brown soft sugar', '1/2 teaspoon chilli powder', '1/2 teaspoon paprika', '1/4 teaspoon dried oregano', '1/4 teaspoon garlic granules', '1/8 teaspoon cayenne pepper', '1 teaspoon olive oil', '1/2 red onion, chopped', '450g chicken, processed in a food processor until minced', '340g mild Italian sausagemeat', '340g tomato puree', '1 (410g) tin kidney beans, rinsed and drained']
